title: Radical Acceptance - Gateway to Love, Wisdom and Peace
itunes:title: Radical Acceptance - Gateway to Love, Wisdom and Peace
description: Radical Acceptance - Gateway to Love, Wisdom and Peace - (2022-02-23) - Acceptance is radical because it undoes our resistance to reality. This talk explores how our meditation practice can cultivate a liberating acceptance, a heartspace that includes all of life and enables us to respond to our world with deep intelligence and compassion.
